title: Tajikistan - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Tajikistan stands at B- with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Tajikistan was last set at B3 with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Tajikistan thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Tajikistan as reported by major credit rating agencies.
